Messages.Author: Jonathan Samuel Will
Messages.Content: Dear students, The exam registration at Moses/MTS should now be open and remains open until April 30th at 23:59. If you are participating in the course, you need to register for the exam. With kind regards Jonathan & Patrick

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Results of the participant selection procedure

Messages.Author: Jonathan Samuel Will
Messages.Content: Dear students, The selection procedure has concluded and the following students have been invited to participate in this semester's Distributed Systems Master Project: Topic A) Christian Helbig Leo Wilhelm Lierse Christian Adam Petri Inese Yilmaz Veit Ferdinand Laule Syed Muhammad Mahmudul Haque Omadbek Meliev  Topic B) Charlotte Sophia Cara Fritsch Arno Bock Daniel Dronov Melisa Akbaydar Felix Urban Jonas Uli Benn Tanem Basaraner Aleksander Gomilsek  See you tomorrow at the brainstorming and group formation session!  With kind regards, Jonathan & Patrick

Messages.Author: Jonathan Samuel Will
Messages.Content: Dear students, Due to the damages in the TEL building, we won't be able to use the seminar room there as we had originally planned. The next session on Wednesday will take place in HL 102  and the ones thereafter will be in MA 742. Our schedule, including the locations are also available on the course's ISIS page.  With kind regards, Jonathan & Patrick

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Welcome to the Master Project Distributed Systems

Messages.Author: Jonathan Samuel Will
Messages.Content: Dear students,  Welcome to this semester's Distributed Systems Master Project. The course starts with the kick-off meeting today (Monday, April 15th) at 10:00-12:00 in room FH 301 With kind regards, Jonathan and Patrick

Messages.Author: Charlotte Sophia Cara Fritsch
Messages.Content: Hi! Do we have admission results yet? Best, Charlotte
